system.descriptionText: When this order is activated, until the end of the turn whenever the Character kills an enemy they can make a +0 Intimidate Test as a Free Action. If successful each ally within Communication range of the Character's Comrade gains +10 to their next Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill Test made before the end of the next turn. Additionally, any Ogryns affected by this ability can enter a Frenzy as a Free Action.
